forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this evening. A few showers developing late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this evening. A few showers developing late. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 64F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early then blustery with scattered thunderstorms later in the day. High near 15C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early then blustery with scattered thunderstorms later in the day. High 59F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 64F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 19C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 66F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 18C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 65F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 18C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 64F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
